== Main Inclusion Report for beecrypt ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/b/beecrypt, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** New build dependency of rpm (previously: code copy in rpm upstream source).
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Just a library, no end user program.
** No Debian bugs.
** Reasonable maintenance in Debian.
** Inactive upstream, no CVS commits for months.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=8924|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper packaging, no patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
